name: Wanted Raccoon (itch)
description:
Hi, it's me - the Wanted Raccoon, who escaped from a kennel to revenge with my #1 enemy - humans. They cut down our forest, and built there houses to live by their own, dividing my family. So my main goal is finding my family that were captured and imprisoned by people.

Yeah, it will be really difficult mission and long way through several locations and different obstacles that I must overcome at all cost!

Thanks heaven that I can steal people's resources from their houses and collect it in my burrow;) You'll see what "gifts" i have for them... And I should acquire some new skills for getting my goal.

Well there's no time to chat, it's time to act!

Follow us here:

Fb: https://.facebook.com/wantedraccoon
Inst: https://www.instagram.com/wantedraccoon
Twit: https://twitter.com/Wanted_Raccoon
Vk: https://vk.com/wanted_raccoon
